name: Hanano Puzzle 2
description:
Hanano Puzzle 2 is a simple puzzle game by the creator of Jelly no Puzzle.

There are colorful square stones which you can move or swap horizontally by clicking them. If one of these stones touches a flower of the same color, a new flower blooms on the stone. The objective is to bloom flowers on all colored stones.

Sounds easy? Give it a try. This might be much harder than it looks.

Note:

  • As the title says, this game is a sequel to another game, Hanano Puzzle, but you don't need to play the previous one.
  • The music may become distracting if you listen for a long time. You can mute it from the level selection screen.
  • Level 7 is solvable.

Programming, art, and music by Tatsunami.

Level design by Lucas Watson.
